description: This is a Flutter widget implementing a referrals screen allowing users to view and copy their referral code, as well as submit new referral codes via an API service.

classes.name: ReferralsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget representing the referrals user interface, providing display and input functionalities for referral codes.

classes.name: _ReferralsScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the logic and UI for the ReferralsScreen, including fetching, submitting referral codes, and UI interactions.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the TextEditingController to free resources.

methods.name: _submitReferral
methods.description: Handles the referral code submission process, including validation, calling the referral service, and displaying success/error messages.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the referrals screen, including displaying the referral code, copy functionality, input field, and submit button.
